SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Class GameHandler

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.GameHandler
public class GameHandler extends Object
This class represents the GameHandler of the game. It is the controller of the game, it is responsible for the game logic.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    GameHandler()
    Default constructor, initialize the GameData and the VirtualClients list.
